name: Crazy Motorbike Drive
description:
Crazy Motorbike Drive is the most funniest Motorbike Sport Game.

Do you like Darts, Bowling, Basketball, Long Jump , High Jump?
It is the opportunity to try it as funny as you can.

If you like Motorbikes and Sport Games try it NOW for FREE.

Buy all of the Motorbikes. The most expensive is the fastest.

FEATURES
- 3D Realistic Motorbike Models
- Arena environment
- 5 different mode: Darts, Bowling, Basketball, Long Jump , High Jump
- Customizable motorbikes
- Customizable character
- Christmas edition

Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
